channel.title: Run server error
channel.description:
Hey Im new to the whole private server thing, so youll have to speak in basic language for me to understand XD! I can run a friends server, when i click run.server i get no errors. A friend sent me a different source, when i click run.server i get this error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
It flashes up then just turns off.
Any ideas how I can fix this , its really important.

item.title: Run server error
item.dc:creator: @Burnzcanzpwnz Burnzcanzpwnz
item.description:
@Burnzcanzpwnz wrote:

Mellor you said your compiler says this?

The system cannot find the path specified
Press any key to continue…
Yeah I had that to and some one told me to do this change the JDK to you’re version of JDK.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

What just click the compiler?

It says

The system cannot find the path specified
Press any key to continue…

You’ve got to compile first.

item.title: Run server error
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Hey Im new to the whole private server thing, so youll have to speak in basic language for me to understand XD!
I can run a friends server, when i click run.server i get no errors. A friend sent me a different source, when i click run.server i get this error

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320)
Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

It flashes up then just turns off.

Any ideas how I can fix this , its really important.
